Fun tip: I often grab local versions of sites to experiment and learn from. You can get a site's html and all of the page's dependencies with a single wget command: wget -H -E -k -p SOMEURL And then as a bonus, deploy it right from the @netlify CLI! https://t.co/MP7fTGRcG2 https://t.co/oFpoXJRQ2U
